Trigger You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened] condition or fail a saving throw against an ingested poison.

Frequency once per day

In dire circumstances you can vomit out your stomach to expel toxins. Reduce your sickened condition by 2 and immediately attempt a saving throw with a +2 circumstance bonus against any ingested poisons you have been exposed to within the last minute. You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] for 1 round as your exposed stomach makes you especially vulnerable to attacks.
